titles.title: To require the Secretary of Defense to brief the Armed Services Committee of the House of Representatives on the feasibility of consolidating covered prevention services into a single facility for each military installation, and for other purposes.

To require the Secretary of Defense to brief the Armed Services Committee of the House of Representatives on the feasibility of consolidating covered prevention services into a single facility for each military installation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
